question_1.answer: Original Driving License,Original Registration Certificate,Taxation Certificate,Emission Test Certificate,Insurance Certificate,Fitness Certificate & Permit (in case of transport vehicles)

question_3.answer: No driver while driving a motor vehicle shall use a mobile phone. (250 (A) MMVR, r/w 177 M.V.Act)

question_4.answer: Yes. Other than driver, occupants of the motor vehicle can use mobile phone

question_5.answer: Abandoned vehicle or unattended vehicle or Parked in a parking restricted zone or Parked in a way causing obstruction to other road user can be towed away.

question_6.answer: Yes. Wearing helmet is compulsory. Violators will be charged U/sec.129/177 of M.V.Act-1988 for which Compounding Amount is Rs.100/-
